Rule.Name: Use Secure Realms (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Tomcat is not using secure Realms, which may expose the server to unauthorized access.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure that Tomcat is configured to use secure Realms (JDBCRealm, LockOutRealm, or DataSourceRealm).

Rule.Name: Use LockOut Realm (Automated)
Rule.NonCompliantComment: Tomcat is not using LockOut Realms, which may allow brute-force login attempts.
Rule.CorrectiveComment: Ensure Tomcat is configured to use LockOut Realms with a failure count and lockout time.
Rule.Correction: sed -i '/<Realm /s/className=".*"/className="org.apache.catalina.realm.LockOutRealm" failureCount="5" lockOutTime="300"/' $CATALINA_HOME/conf/server.xml; systemctl restart tomcat10
